alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:23PM MDT until August 01 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... North central Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Northern Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 422 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Culbertson to near Richey, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Fairview, Lambert, Fort Union Trading Post, East Fairview, Snowden, Enid, Nohly, Wooley, Fort Union and Crane. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
